text: Absolutely. The future of humanity is multi-planetary. We need to become a spacefaring civilization.
Tesla's mission is to accelerate the world's transition to sustainable energy. This is not optional.
First principles thinking is critical. Break down problems to their fundamental truths and reason up from there.
AI is potentially more dangerous than nuclear weapons. We need regulation, but we must be careful not to stifle innovation.
The engineering challenges are immense, but solvable. That's what matters. We will solve them.
